trans-unit.source: What is Hadoop in HDInsight: Cloud big data analysis | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: What is Hadoop in HDInsight: Cloud big data analysis | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: An introduction to Hadoop components in the cloud in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: An introduction to Hadoop components in the cloud in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Learn how HDInsight uses Hadoop clusters to manage, analyze, and report on big data.
trans-unit.target: Learn how HDInsight uses Hadoop clusters to manage, analyze, and report on big data.

trans-unit.source: Introduction to Hadoop in HDInsight: Big-data analysis and processing in the cloud
trans-unit.target: Introduction to Hadoop in HDInsight: Big-data analysis and processing in the cloud

trans-unit.source: Get an introduction to Hadoop, its ecosystem, and big data in Azure HDInsight: What is Hadoop in HDInsight and what are the Hadoop components, common terminology, and scenarios for big data analysis?
trans-unit.target: Get an introduction to Hadoop, its ecosystem, and big data in Azure HDInsight: What is Hadoop in HDInsight and what are the Hadoop components, common terminology, and scenarios for big data analysis?

trans-unit.source: Also, learn about Hadoop tutorials, documentation, and resources for using Hadoop in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Also, learn about Hadoop tutorials, documentation, and resources for using Hadoop in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: What is Hadoop in HDInsight?
trans-unit.target: What is Hadoop in HDInsight?

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight deploys and provisions Apache Hadoop clusters in the cloud, providing a software framework designed to manage, analyze, and report on big data with high reliability and availability.
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight deploys and provisions Apache Hadoop clusters in the cloud, providing a software framework designed to manage, analyze, and report on big data with high reliability and availability.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight uses the **Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP)** Hadoop distribution.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight uses the **Hortonworks Data Platform (HDP)** Hadoop distribution.

trans-unit.source: Hadoop often refers to the entire Hadoop ecosystem of components, which includes Storm and HBase clusters, as well as other technologies under the Hadoop umbrella.
trans-unit.target: Hadoop often refers to the entire Hadoop ecosystem of components, which includes Storm and HBase clusters, as well as other technologies under the Hadoop umbrella.

trans-unit.source: See [Overview of the Hadoop ecosystem on HDInsight](#overview) below for details.
trans-unit.target: See [Overview of the Hadoop ecosystem on HDInsight](#overview) below for details.

trans-unit.source: What is big data?
trans-unit.target: What is big data?

trans-unit.source: Big data refers to data being collected in ever-escalating volumes, at increasingly high velocities, and for a widening variety of unstructured formats and variable semantic contexts.
trans-unit.target: Big data refers to data being collected in ever-escalating volumes, at increasingly high velocities, and for a widening variety of unstructured formats and variable semantic contexts.

trans-unit.source: Big data describes any large body of digital information, from the text in a Twitter feed, to the sensor information from industrial equipment, to information about customer browsing and purchases on an online catalog.
trans-unit.target: Big data describes any large body of digital information, from the text in a Twitter feed, to the sensor information from industrial equipment, to information about customer browsing and purchases on an online catalog.

trans-unit.source: Big data can be historical (meaning stored data) or real-time (meaning streamed directly from the source).
trans-unit.target: Big data can be historical (meaning stored data) or real-time (meaning streamed directly from the source).

trans-unit.source: For big data to provide actionable intelligence or insight, not only must the right questions be asked and data be relevant to the issues be collected, the data must be accessible, cleaned, analyzed, and then presented in a useful way.
trans-unit.target: For big data to provide actionable intelligence or insight, not only must the right questions be asked and data be relevant to the issues be collected, the data must be accessible, cleaned, analyzed, and then presented in a useful way.

trans-unit.source: That's where big data analysis on Hadoop in HDInsight can help.
trans-unit.target: That's where big data analysis on Hadoop in HDInsight can help.

trans-unit.source: Overview of the Hadoop ecosystem on HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Overview of the Hadoop ecosystem on HDInsight

trans-unit.source: HDInsight is a cloud implementation on Microsoft Azure of the rapidly exanding Apache Hadoop technology stack that is the go-to solution for big data analysis.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight is a cloud implementation on Microsoft Azure of the rapidly exanding Apache Hadoop technology stack that is the go-to solution for big data analysis.

trans-unit.source: It includes implementations of Storm, HBase, Pig, Hive, Sqoop, Oozie, Ambari, and so on.
trans-unit.target: It includes implementations of Storm, HBase, Pig, Hive, Sqoop, Oozie, Ambari, and so on.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight also integrates with business intelligence (BI) tools such as Excel, SQL Server Analysis Services, and SQL Server Reporting Services.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight also integrates with business intelligence (BI) tools such as Excel, SQL Server Analysis Services, and SQL Server Reporting Services.

trans-unit.source: Linux and Windows clusters
trans-unit.target: Linux and Windows clusters

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight deploys and provisions Hadoop clusters in the cloud, by using either **Linux** or **Windows** as the underlying OS.
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight deploys and provisions Hadoop clusters in the cloud, by using either **Linux** or **Windows** as the underlying OS.

trans-unit.source: **HDInsight on Linux (Preview)** - A Hadoop cluster on Ubuntu.
trans-unit.target: **HDInsight on Linux (Preview)** - A Hadoop cluster on Ubuntu.

trans-unit.source: Use this if you are familiar with Linux or Unix, are migrating from an existing Linux-based Hadoop solution, or want easy integration with Hadoop ecosystem components built for Linux.
trans-unit.target: Use this if you are familiar with Linux or Unix, are migrating from an existing Linux-based Hadoop solution, or want easy integration with Hadoop ecosystem components built for Linux.

trans-unit.source: **HDInsight on Windows** - A Hadoop cluster on Windows Server.
trans-unit.target: **HDInsight on Windows** - A Hadoop cluster on Windows Server.

trans-unit.source: Use this if you are familiar with Windows, are migrating from an existing Windows-based Hadoop solution, or want to integrate with .NET or other Windows capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Use this if you are familiar with Windows, are migrating from an existing Windows-based Hadoop solution, or want to integrate with .NET or other Windows capabilities.

trans-unit.source: The following table compares the two:
trans-unit.target: The following table compares the two:

trans-unit.source: Category
trans-unit.target: Category

trans-unit.target: Hadoop on Linux

trans-unit.target: Hadoop on Windows

trans-unit.target: Cluster OS

trans-unit.target: Ubuntu 12.04 Long Term Support (LTS)

trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

trans-unit.target: Cluster Type

trans-unit.source: Hadoop
trans-unit.target: Hadoop

trans-unit.source: Hadoop, HBase, Storm
trans-unit.target: Hadoop, HBase, Storm

trans-unit.source: Deployment
trans-unit.target: Deployment

trans-unit.source: Azure Portal, Azure CLI, Azure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Azure Portal, Azure CLI, Azure PowerShell

trans-unit.target: Azure Portal, Azure CLI, Azure PowerShell, HDInsight .NET SDK

trans-unit.source: Cluster UI
trans-unit.target: Cluster UI

trans-unit.source: Ambari
trans-unit.target: Ambari

trans-unit.target: Cluster Dashboard

trans-unit.target: Remote Access

trans-unit.target: Secure Shell (SSH)

trans-unit.target: Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP)

trans-unit.source: Hadoop, HBase, Storm, and customized clusters
trans-unit.target: Hadoop, HBase, Storm, and customized clusters

trans-unit.source: HDInsight provides cluster configurations for Hadoop, HBase, or Storm.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight provides cluster configurations for Hadoop, HBase, or Storm.

trans-unit.source: Or, you can customize clusters with script actions.
trans-unit.target: Or, you can customize clusters with script actions.

trans-unit.source: **Hadoop** (the "Query" workload): Provides reliable data storage with [HDFS](#HDFS), and a simple [MapReduce](#mapreduce) programming model to process and analyze data in parallel.
trans-unit.target: **Hadoop** (the "Query" workload): Provides reliable data storage with [HDFS](#HDFS), and a simple [MapReduce](#mapreduce) programming model to process and analyze data in parallel.

trans-unit.source: **HBase** (the "NoSQL" workload): A NoSQL database built on Hadoop that provides random access and strong consistency for large amounts of unstructured and semi-structured data - potentially billions of rows times millions of columns.
trans-unit.target: **HBase** (the "NoSQL" workload): A NoSQL database built on Hadoop that provides random access and strong consistency for large amounts of unstructured and semi-structured data - potentially billions of rows times millions of columns.

trans-unit.source: See [Overview of HBase on HDInsight](hdinsight-hbase-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Overview of HBase on HDInsight](hdinsight-hbase-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: **Apache Storm** (the "Stream" workload): A distributed, real-time computation system for processing large streams of data fast.
trans-unit.target: **Apache Storm** (the "Stream" workload): A distributed, real-time computation system for processing large streams of data fast.

trans-unit.source: Storm is offered as a managed cluster in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Storm is offered as a managed cluster in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: See [Analyze real-time sensor data using Storm and Hadoop](hdinsight-storm-sensor-data-analysis.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Analyze real-time sensor data using Storm and Hadoop](hdinsight-storm-sensor-data-analysis.md).

trans-unit.source: What are the Hadoop components?
trans-unit.target: What are the Hadoop components?

trans-unit.source: In addition to the previous overall configurations, the following individual components are also included on HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the previous overall configurations, the following individual components are also included on HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: **[Ambari](#ambari)**: Cluster provisioning, management, and monitoring.
trans-unit.target: **[Ambari](#ambari)**: Cluster provisioning, management, and monitoring.

trans-unit.source: **[Avro](#avro)** (Microsoft .NET Library for Avro): Data serialization for the Microsoft .NET environment.
trans-unit.target: **[Avro](#avro)** (Microsoft .NET Library for Avro): Data serialization for the Microsoft .NET environment.

trans-unit.source: **[Hive & HCatalog](#hive)**: Structured Query Language (SQL)-like querying, and a table and storage management layer.
trans-unit.target: **[Hive & HCatalog](#hive)**: Structured Query Language (SQL)-like querying, and a table and storage management layer.

trans-unit.source: **[Mahout](#mahout)**: Machine learning.
trans-unit.target: **[Mahout](#mahout)**: Machine learning.

trans-unit.source: **[MapReduce and YARN](#mapreduce)**: Distributed processing and resource management.
trans-unit.target: **[MapReduce and YARN](#mapreduce)**: Distributed processing and resource management.

trans-unit.source: **[Oozie](#oozie)**: Workflow management.
trans-unit.target: **[Oozie](#oozie)**: Workflow management.

trans-unit.source: **[Phoenix](#phoenix)**: Relational database layer over HBase.
trans-unit.target: **[Phoenix](#phoenix)**: Relational database layer over HBase.

trans-unit.source: **[Pig](#pig)**: Simpler scripting for MapReduce transformations.
trans-unit.target: **[Pig](#pig)**: Simpler scripting for MapReduce transformations.

trans-unit.source: **[Sqoop](#sqoop)**: Data import and export.
trans-unit.target: **[Sqoop](#sqoop)**: Data import and export.

trans-unit.source: **[Tez](#tez)**: Allows data-intensive processes to run efficiently at scale.
trans-unit.target: **[Tez](#tez)**: Allows data-intensive processes to run efficiently at scale.

trans-unit.source: **[ZooKeeper](#zookeeper)**: Coordination of processes in distributed systems.
trans-unit.target: **[ZooKeeper](#zookeeper)**: Coordination of processes in distributed systems.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] For information on the specific components and version information, see [What's new in the Hadoop cluster versions provided by HDInsight?][component-versioning]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] For information on the specific components and version information, see [What's new in the Hadoop cluster versions provided by HDInsight?][component-versioning]

trans-unit.source: Ambari
trans-unit.target: Ambari

trans-unit.source: Apache Ambari is for provisioning, managing and monitoring Apache Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Apache Ambari is for provisioning, managing and monitoring Apache Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: It includes an intuitive collection of operator tools and a robust set of APIs that hide the complexity of Hadoop, simplifying the operation of clusters.
trans-unit.target: It includes an intuitive collection of operator tools and a robust set of APIs that hide the complexity of Hadoop, simplifying the operation of clusters.

trans-unit.source: See [Manage HDInsight clusters using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md) (Linux only), [Monitor Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using the Ambari API](hdinsight-monitor-use-ambari-api.md), and Apache Ambari API reference.
trans-unit.target: See [Manage HDInsight clusters using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md) (Linux only), [Monitor Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using the Ambari API](hdinsight-monitor-use-ambari-api.md), and Apache Ambari API reference.

trans-unit.source: Avro (Microsoft .NET Library for Avro)
trans-unit.target: Avro (Microsoft .NET Library for Avro)

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft .NET Library for Avro implements the Apache Avro compact binary data interchange format for serialization for the Microsoft .NET environment.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft .NET Library for Avro implements the Apache Avro compact binary data interchange format for serialization for the Microsoft .NET environment.

trans-unit.source: It uses JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to define a language-agnostic schema that underwrites language interoperability, meaning data serialized in one language can be read in another.
trans-unit.target: It uses JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to define a language-agnostic schema that underwrites language interoperability, meaning data serialized in one language can be read in another.

trans-unit.source: Detailed information on the format can be found in the Apache Avro Specification.
trans-unit.target: Detailed information on the format can be found in the Apache Avro Specification.

trans-unit.source: The format of Avro files supports the distributed MapReduce programming model.
trans-unit.target: The format of Avro files supports the distributed MapReduce programming model.

trans-unit.source: Files are “splittable”, meaning you can seek any point in a file and start reading from a particular block.
trans-unit.target: Files are “splittable”, meaning you can seek any point in a file and start reading from a particular block.

trans-unit.source: To find out how, see [Serialize data with the Microsoft .NET Library for Avro](hdinsight-dotnet-avro-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: To find out how, see [Serialize data with the Microsoft .NET Library for Avro](hdinsight-dotnet-avro-serialization.md).

trans-unit.source: HDFS
trans-unit.target: HDFS

trans-unit.source: Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) is a distributed file system that, with MapReduce and YARN, is the core of the Hadoop ecosystem.
trans-unit.target: Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) is a distributed file system that, with MapReduce and YARN, is the core of the Hadoop ecosystem.

trans-unit.source: HDFS is the standard file system for Hadoop clusters on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: HDFS is the standard file system for Hadoop clusters on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Hive & HCatalog
trans-unit.target: Hive & HCatalog

trans-unit.source: Apache Hive is data warehouse software built on Hadoop that allows you to query and manage large datasets in distributed storage by using a SQL-like language called HiveQL.
trans-unit.target: Apache Hive is data warehouse software built on Hadoop that allows you to query and manage large datasets in distributed storage by using a SQL-like language called HiveQL.

trans-unit.source: Hive, like Pig, is an abstraction on top of MapReduce.
trans-unit.target: Hive, like Pig, is an abstraction on top of MapReduce.

trans-unit.source: When run, Hive translates queries into a series of MapReduce jobs.
trans-unit.target: When run, Hive translates queries into a series of MapReduce jobs.

trans-unit.source: Hive is conceptually closer to a relational database management system than Pig, and is therefore appropriate for use with more structured data.
trans-unit.target: Hive is conceptually closer to a relational database management system than Pig, and is therefore appropriate for use with more structured data.

trans-unit.source: For unstructured data, Pig is the better choice.
trans-unit.target: For unstructured data, Pig is the better choice.

trans-unit.source: See [Use Hive with Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-use-hive.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Use Hive with Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-use-hive.md).

trans-unit.source: Apache HCatalog is a table and storage management layer for Hadoop that presents users with a relational view of data.
trans-unit.target: Apache HCatalog is a table and storage management layer for Hadoop that presents users with a relational view of data.

trans-unit.source: In HCatalog, you can read and write files in any format for which a Hive SerDe (serializer-deserializer) can be written.
trans-unit.target: In HCatalog, you can read and write files in any format for which a Hive SerDe (serializer-deserializer) can be written.

trans-unit.source: Mahout
trans-unit.target: Mahout

trans-unit.source: Apache Mahout is a scalable library of machine learning algorithms that run on Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: Apache Mahout is a scalable library of machine learning algorithms that run on Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: Using principles of statistics, machine learning applications teach systems to learn from data and to use past outcomes to determine future behavior.
trans-unit.target: Using principles of statistics, machine learning applications teach systems to learn from data and to use past outcomes to determine future behavior.

trans-unit.source: See [Generate movie recommendations using Mahout on Hadoop](hdinsight-mahout.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Generate movie recommendations using Mahout on Hadoop](hdinsight-mahout.md).

trans-unit.source: MapReduce and YARN
trans-unit.target: MapReduce and YARN

trans-unit.source: Hadoop MapReduce is a software framework for writing applications to process big-data sets in parallel.
trans-unit.target: Hadoop MapReduce is a software framework for writing applications to process big-data sets in parallel.

trans-unit.source: A MapReduce job splits large datasets and organizes the data into key-value pairs for processing.
trans-unit.target: A MapReduce job splits large datasets and organizes the data into key-value pairs for processing.

trans-unit.source: Apache YARN is the next generation of MapReduce (MapReduce 2.0, or MRv2) that splits the two major tasks of JobTracker - resource management and job scheduling/monitoring - into separate entities.
trans-unit.target: Apache YARN is the next generation of MapReduce (MapReduce 2.0, or MRv2) that splits the two major tasks of JobTracker - resource management and job scheduling/monitoring - into separate entities.

trans-unit.source: For more information on MapReduce, see MapReduce in the Hadoop Wiki.
trans-unit.target: For more information on MapReduce, see MapReduce in the Hadoop Wiki.

trans-unit.source: To learn about YARN, see Apache Hadoop NextGen MapReduce (YARN).
trans-unit.target: To learn about YARN, see Apache Hadoop NextGen MapReduce (YARN).

trans-unit.source: Oozie
trans-unit.target: Oozie

trans-unit.source: Apache Oozie is a workflow coordination system that manages Hadoop jobs.
trans-unit.target: Apache Oozie is a workflow coordination system that manages Hadoop jobs.

trans-unit.source: It is integrated with the Hadoop stack and supports Hadoop jobs for MapReduce, Pig, Hive, and Sqoop.
trans-unit.target: It is integrated with the Hadoop stack and supports Hadoop jobs for MapReduce, Pig, Hive, and Sqoop.

trans-unit.source: It can also be used to schedule jobs specific to a system, like Java programs or shell scripts.
trans-unit.target: It can also be used to schedule jobs specific to a system, like Java programs or shell scripts.

trans-unit.source: See [Use a time-based Oozie Coordinator with Hadoop](hdinsight-use-oozie-coordinator-time.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Use a time-based Oozie Coordinator with Hadoop](hdinsight-use-oozie-coordinator-time.md).

trans-unit.source: Phoenix
trans-unit.target: Phoenix

trans-unit.source: Apache Phoenix is a relational database layer over HBase.
trans-unit.target: Apache Phoenix is a relational database layer over HBase.

trans-unit.source: Phoenix includes a JDBC driver that allows users to query and manage SQL tables directly.
trans-unit.target: Phoenix includes a JDBC driver that allows users to query and manage SQL tables directly.

trans-unit.source: Phoenix translates queries and other statements into native NoSQL API calls - instead of using MapReduce - thus enabling faster applications on top of NoSQL stores.
trans-unit.target: Phoenix translates queries and other statements into native NoSQL API calls - instead of using MapReduce - thus enabling faster applications on top of NoSQL stores.

trans-unit.source: See [Use Apache Phoenix and SQuirreL with HBase clusters](hdinsight-hbase-phoenix-squirrel.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Use Apache Phoenix and SQuirreL with HBase clusters](hdinsight-hbase-phoenix-squirrel.md).

trans-unit.source: Pig
trans-unit.target: Pig

trans-unit.source: Apache Pig is a high-level platform that allows you to perform complex MapReduce transformations on very large datasets by using a simple scripting language called Pig Latin.
trans-unit.target: Apache Pig is a high-level platform that allows you to perform complex MapReduce transformations on very large datasets by using a simple scripting language called Pig Latin.

trans-unit.source: Pig translates the Pig Latin scripts so they’ll run within Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: Pig translates the Pig Latin scripts so they’ll run within Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: You can create User Defined Functions (UDFs) to extend Pig Latin.
trans-unit.target: You can create User Defined Functions (UDFs) to extend Pig Latin.

trans-unit.source: See [Use Pig with Hadoop to analyze an Apache log file](hdinsight-use-pig.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Use Pig with Hadoop to analyze an Apache log file](hdinsight-use-pig.md).

trans-unit.source: Sqoop
trans-unit.target: Sqoop

trans-unit.source: Apache Sqoop is tool that transfers bulk data between Hadoop and relational databases such a SQL, or other structured data stores, as efficiently as possible.
trans-unit.target: Apache Sqoop is tool that transfers bulk data between Hadoop and relational databases such a SQL, or other structured data stores, as efficiently as possible.

trans-unit.source: See [Use Sqoop with Hadoop](hdinsight-use-sqoop.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Use Sqoop with Hadoop](hdinsight-use-sqoop.md).

trans-unit.source: Tez
trans-unit.target: Tez

trans-unit.source: Apache Tez is an application framework built on Hadoop YARN that executes complex, acyclic graphs of general data processing.
trans-unit.target: Apache Tez is an application framework built on Hadoop YARN that executes complex, acyclic graphs of general data processing.

trans-unit.source: It's a more flexible and powerful successor to the MapReduce framework that allows data-intensive processes, such as Hive, to run more efficiently at scale.
trans-unit.target: It's a more flexible and powerful successor to the MapReduce framework that allows data-intensive processes, such as Hive, to run more efficiently at scale.

trans-unit.source: See ["Use Apache Tez for improved performance" in Use Hive and HiveQL](hdinsight-use-hive.md#usetez).
trans-unit.target: See ["Use Apache Tez for improved performance" in Use Hive and HiveQL](hdinsight-use-hive.md#usetez).

trans-unit.source: ZooKeeper
trans-unit.target: ZooKeeper

trans-unit.source: Apache ZooKeeper coordinates processes in large distributed systems by means of a shared hierarchical namespace of data registers (znodes).
trans-unit.target: Apache ZooKeeper coordinates processes in large distributed systems by means of a shared hierarchical namespace of data registers (znodes).

trans-unit.source: Znodes contain small amounts of meta information needed to coordinate processes: status, location, configuration, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Znodes contain small amounts of meta information needed to coordinate processes: status, location, configuration, and so on.

trans-unit.source: Advantages of Hadoop in the cloud
trans-unit.target: Advantages of Hadoop in the cloud

trans-unit.source: As part of the Azure cloud ecosystem, Hadoop in HDInsight offers a number of benefits, among them:
trans-unit.target: As part of the Azure cloud ecosystem, Hadoop in HDInsight offers a number of benefits, among them:

trans-unit.source: Automatic provisioning of Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Automatic provisioning of Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight clusters are much easier to create than manually configuring Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight clusters are much easier to create than manually configuring Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Provision Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Provision Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md).

trans-unit.source: State-of-the-art Hadoop components.
trans-unit.target: State-of-the-art Hadoop components.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [What's new in the Hadoop cluster versions provided by HDInsight?][component-versioning].
trans-unit.target: For details, see [What's new in the Hadoop cluster versions provided by HDInsight?][component-versioning].

trans-unit.source: High availability and reliability of clusters.
trans-unit.target: High availability and reliability of clusters.

trans-unit.source: See [Availability and reliability of Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-high-availability.md) for details.
trans-unit.target: See [Availability and reliability of Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-high-availability.md) for details.

trans-unit.source: Efficient and economical data storage with Azure Blob storage, a Hadoop-compatible option.
trans-unit.target: Efficient and economical data storage with Azure Blob storage, a Hadoop-compatible option.

trans-unit.source: See [Use Azure Blob storage with Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-use-blob-storage.md) for details.
trans-unit.target: See [Use Azure Blob storage with Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-use-blob-storage.md) for details.

trans-unit.source: Integration with other Azure services, including [Web apps](../documentation/services/app-service/web/) and [SQL Database](../documentation/services/sql-database/).
trans-unit.target: Integration with other Azure services, including [Web apps](../documentation/services/app-service/web/) and [SQL Database](../documentation/services/sql-database/).

trans-unit.source: Low entry cost.
trans-unit.target: Low entry cost.

trans-unit.source: Start a [free trial](/pricing/free-trial/), or consult [HDInsight pricing details](/pricing/details/hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: Start a [free trial](/pricing/free-trial/), or consult [HDInsight pricing details](/pricing/details/hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: To read more about the advantages on Hadoop in HDInsight, see the [Azure features page for HDInsight][marketing-page].
trans-unit.target: To read more about the advantages on Hadoop in HDInsight, see the [Azure features page for HDInsight][marketing-page].

trans-unit.source: Resources for learning more about big-data analysis, Hadoop, and HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Resources for learning more about big-data analysis, Hadoop, and HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Build on this introduction to Hadoop on HDInsight and big data analysis with the resources below.
trans-unit.target: Build on this introduction to Hadoop on HDInsight and big data analysis with the resources below.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight on Linux (Preview)
trans-unit.target: HDInsight on Linux (Preview)

trans-unit.source: [Get started with HDInsight on Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started.md): A quick-start tutorial for provisioning HDInsight Hadoop clusters on Linux and running sample Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: [Get started with HDInsight on Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started.md): A quick-start tutorial for provisioning HDInsight Hadoop clusters on Linux and running sample Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: [Provision HDInsight on Linux using custom options](hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters.md): Learn how to provision an HDInsight Hadoop cluster on Linux by using custom options through the Azure Portal, Azure CLI, or Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: [Provision HDInsight on Linux using custom options](hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters.md): Learn how to provision an HDInsight Hadoop cluster on Linux by using custom options through the Azure Portal, Azure CLI, or Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: [Working with HDInsight on Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-information.md): Get some quick tips on working with Hadoop Linux clusters provisioned on Azure.
trans-unit.target: [Working with HDInsight on Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-information.md): Get some quick tips on working with Hadoop Linux clusters provisioned on Azure.

trans-unit.source: [Manage HDInsight clusters using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md): Learn how to monitor and manage your Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight cluster by using Ambari Web, or the Ambari REST API.
trans-unit.target: [Manage HDInsight clusters using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md): Learn how to monitor and manage your Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight cluster by using Ambari Web, or the Ambari REST API.

trans-unit.target: HDInsight on Windows

trans-unit.source: [HDInsight documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/hdinsight/): The documentation page for Azure HDInsight with links to articles, videos, and more resources.
trans-unit.target: [HDInsight documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/hdinsight/): The documentation page for Azure HDInsight with links to articles, videos, and more resources.

trans-unit.source: [Learning map for HDInsight](hdinsight-learn-map.md): A guided tour of Hadoop documentation for HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: [Learning map for HDInsight](hdinsight-learn-map.md): A guided tour of Hadoop documentation for HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: [Get started with Azure HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md): A quick-start tutorial for using Hadoop in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: [Get started with Azure HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md): A quick-start tutorial for using Hadoop in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Apache Hadoop
trans-unit.target: Apache Hadoop

trans-unit.source: Apache Hadoop: Learn more about the Apache Hadoop software library, a framework that allows for the distributed processing of large datasets across clusters of computers.
trans-unit.target: Apache Hadoop: Learn more about the Apache Hadoop software library, a framework that allows for the distributed processing of large datasets across clusters of computers.

trans-unit.source: HDFS: Learn more about the architecture and design of the Hadoop Distributed File System, the primary storage system used by Hadoop applications.
trans-unit.target: HDFS: Learn more about the architecture and design of the Hadoop Distributed File System, the primary storage system used by Hadoop applications.

trans-unit.source: MapReduce Tutorial: Learn more about the programming framework for writing Hadoop applications that rapidly process large amounts of data in parallel on large clusters of compute nodes.
trans-unit.target: MapReduce Tutorial: Learn more about the programming framework for writing Hadoop applications that rapidly process large amounts of data in parallel on large clusters of compute nodes.

trans-unit.source: SQL Database on Azure
trans-unit.target: SQL Database on Azure

trans-unit.source: [Azure SQL Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee336279.aspx): MSDN documentation for SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: [Azure SQL Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee336279.aspx): MSDN documentation for SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: [Management Portal for SQL Database](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn771027.aspx): A lightweight and easy-to-use database management tool for managing SQL Database in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: [Management Portal for SQL Database](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn771027.aspx): A lightweight and easy-to-use database management tool for managing SQL Database in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: [Adventure Works for SQL Database](http://msftdbprodsamples.codeplex.com/releases/view/37304): Download page for a SQL Database sample database.
trans-unit.target: [Adventure Works for SQL Database](http://msftdbprodsamples.codeplex.com/releases/view/37304): Download page for a SQL Database sample database.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft business intelligence (for HDInsight on Windows)
trans-unit.target: Microsoft business intelligence (for HDInsight on Windows)

trans-unit.source: Familiar business intelligence (BI) tools - such as Excel, PowerPivot, SQL Server Analysis Services, and SQL Server Reporting Services - retrieve, analyze, and report data integrated with HDInsight by using either the Power Query add-in or the Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver.
trans-unit.target: Familiar business intelligence (BI) tools - such as Excel, PowerPivot, SQL Server Analysis Services, and SQL Server Reporting Services - retrieve, analyze, and report data integrated with HDInsight by using either the Power Query add-in or the Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver.

trans-unit.source: These BI tools can help in your big-data analysis:
trans-unit.target: These BI tools can help in your big-data analysis:

trans-unit.source: [Connect Excel to Hadoop with Power Query](hdinsight-connect-excel-power-query.md): Learn how to connect Excel to the Azure Storage account that stores the data associated with your HDInsight cluster by using Microsoft Power Query for Excel.
trans-unit.target: [Connect Excel to Hadoop with Power Query](hdinsight-connect-excel-power-query.md): Learn how to connect Excel to the Azure Storage account that stores the data associated with your HDInsight cluster by using Microsoft Power Query for Excel.

trans-unit.source: [Connect Excel to Hadoop with the Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver](hdinsight-connect-excel-hive-ODBC-driver.md): Learn how to import data from HDInsight with the Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver.
trans-unit.target: [Connect Excel to Hadoop with the Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver](hdinsight-connect-excel-hive-ODBC-driver.md): Learn how to import data from HDInsight with the Microsoft Hive ODBC Driver.

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft Cloud Platform](http://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/solutions/business-intelligence/default.aspx): Learn about Power BI for Office 365, download the SQL Server trial, and set up SharePoint Server 2013 and SQL Server BI.
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft Cloud Platform](http://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/solutions/business-intelligence/default.aspx): Learn about Power BI for Office 365, download the SQL Server trial, and set up SharePoint Server 2013 and SQL Server BI.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about SQL Server Analysis Services.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about SQL Server Analysis Services.

trans-unit.source: Learn about SQL Server Reporting Services.
trans-unit.target: Learn about SQL Server Reporting Services.

trans-unit.source: Try Hadoop solutions for big-data analysis (for HDInsight on Windows)
trans-unit.target: Try Hadoop solutions for big-data analysis (for HDInsight on Windows)

trans-unit.source: Use big data analysis on your organization's data to gain insights into your business.
trans-unit.target: Use big data analysis on your organization's data to gain insights into your business.

trans-unit.source: Here are some examples:
trans-unit.target: Here are some examples:

trans-unit.source: [Analyze HVAC sensor data](hdinsight-hive-analyze-sensor-data.md): Learn how to analyze sensor data by using Hive with HDInsight (Hadoop), and then visualize the data in Microsoft Excel.
trans-unit.target: [Analyze HVAC sensor data](hdinsight-hive-analyze-sensor-data.md): Learn how to analyze sensor data by using Hive with HDInsight (Hadoop), and then visualize the data in Microsoft Excel.

trans-unit.source: In this sample, you'll use Hive to process historical data produced by HVAC systems to see which systems can't reliably maintain a set temperature.
trans-unit.target: In this sample, you'll use Hive to process historical data produced by HVAC systems to see which systems can't reliably maintain a set temperature.

trans-unit.source: [Use Hive with HDInsight to analyze website logs](hdinsight-hive-analyze-website-log.md): Learn how to use HiveQL in HDInsight to analyze website logs to get insight into the frequency of visits in a day from external websites, and a summary of website errors that the users experience.
trans-unit.target: [Use Hive with HDInsight to analyze website logs](hdinsight-hive-analyze-website-log.md): Learn how to use HiveQL in HDInsight to analyze website logs to get insight into the frequency of visits in a day from external websites, and a summary of website errors that the users experience.

trans-unit.source: [Analyze sensor data in real-time with Storm and HBase in HDInsight (Hadoop)](hdinsight-storm-sensor-data-analysis.md): Learn how to build a solution that uses a Storm cluster in HDInsight to process sensor data from Azure Event Hubs, and then displays the processed sensor data as near-real-time information on a web-based dashboard.
trans-unit.target: [Analyze sensor data in real-time with Storm and HBase in HDInsight (Hadoop)](hdinsight-storm-sensor-data-analysis.md): Learn how to build a solution that uses a Storm cluster in HDInsight to process sensor data from Azure Event Hubs, and then displays the processed sensor data as near-real-time information on a web-based dashboard.

trans-unit.target: test
